5.7.21  8:04 pm   Hearing your thoughts on 12TET and your experiments with just intonation was really cool! Have you done any similar tinkering with tuning systems like 19TET, 24TET, etc?

     I'm really interested to try and experiment with them myself but I'm having difficulty figuring out how to do that in a way that isn't weird.

You can use a normal midi-controller to try to make 24TET music, but doing that for any extended period of time seems like it would be confusing to work with if you're somebody who already has normal 12TET piano muscle memory. Without hardware made for microtones or a standardized system of notation it seems like a difficult thing to incorporate into the existing system. What are your thoughts on all of this?

5.7.21  4:06 pm   I never feel like my music is truly great. I mean, I like my music, but I never feel like my music is something that someone would hear and feel powerful emotions that would make them want to listen to it repeatedly. Do you ever feel this way? How could you go about creating music that would make a person feel intensely?
